des:
Control the Smart device of LifeSmart and Cololight, like turn on or off the lights, turn on or off the switches and get the room temperature or humidity and so on.
Users can achieve the skill as the instruction below.
-Open the Alexa app
-Click Skills and then search and enable LifeSmart SmartHome. 
-Then log in using LifeSmart/Cololight Account and click Authorize. 
-Finally tap ‘Discover Device’ to discover all devices under your LifeSmart/Cololight Account that can be controlled by Alexa.
You can find the detail information about LifeSmart products via http://us.ilifesmart.com. 
You can find the detail information about Cololight products via https://cololight.com/. 
Cololight is a sub-brand affiliated with LifeSmart, Cololight shares the Alexa Skills with LifeSmart.
